resources.string: Location permission is required in order to use this feature properly.Please grant the permission.
Location permission is blocked. Please allow permission from settings screen to use this feature.
Please enable access to device location to proceed further.
Permission to access location in background is required for this feature to work properly. Please select "Allow all the time" option.
Permission to access location in background is blocked. Please allow to access location in background by selecting "Allow all the time" option from settings screen to use this feature.
